fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-32743].
  {panel}

Create Button appears for a user even when he does not have permission to create content on that space.
It will not show an option for this user to create a page within that space, however it can confuse the user giving the impression that he can, in fact, create content on the current space.

By default, it will open the Create Box with the default options (create page, etc) but on the top, on the Select Space it will just show the spaces this user can create content in.

It would be easier for users if this button shows just when the user can create content on that space.
fields.summary: Create Button appears for a user even when he does not have permission to create content on that space.

fields.description:
Customer reported that when using IE10 and Confluence is running on <iframe>, 
Confluence is not able to add link to a page in edit mode either using {{[ ]}} shortcut or add link button from the editor toolbar.

The javascript error thrown:
{code}
Object does not support feature or method: createRange
{code}

Additionally, it works normally if using other browsers i.e. Firefox, Chrome
fields.summary: Confluence page inside of iframe can't add link in edit mode when using IE10

fields.description:
If no key button is pressed while creating a link, the Insert button doesn't work.

How to reproduce
0. Copy some URL in the clipboard
1. Create/edit a page
2. Select some text and click the lnser Link button
3. Only with the mouse, go to weblink, and paste the URL (again just with the mouse).
4. Click insert. It doesn't work.

If you back to the address field and tap some key (e.g. Ctrl) and then click insert, everything works fine. 
I believe this could be some form validation issue.
fields.summary: Adding a link with mouse copy-paste doesn't work

fields.description:
When canceling creation of a page when there is a meeting notes draft present, a ClassCastException is thrown:

How to reproduce:
1. Click Create -> Meeting notes
2. In the opened editor page, click Create (it just redirect to a page creation)
3. Click cancel.

Result: a shown error with the stack trace:
{code}
java.lang.ClassCastException: com.atlassian.confluence.pages.Draft cannot be cast to com.atlassian.confluence.pages.AbstractPage
    at com.atlassian.confluence.pages.persistence.dao.hibernate.HibernateAbstractPageDao.getAbstractPageById(HibernateAbstractPageDao.java:18) 
{code}
fields.summary: Creating content with blueprint content draft behind, causes a ClassCastException

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-32739].
  {panel}

We are creating space based on individual's name, and it will using the spacekey as the url.

example:
Space Name Microsoft
Space Key: MIC
url:
http://localhost:8090/display/MIC/Microsoft+Home

It will be nice if the url will take the title instead of spacekey,
so the name wont be shorten, which will easier for user to remember/access
fields.summary: Using Space title as url instead of space key
Include Fix Version field when creating new JIRA Issues macro in Confluence
Cannot shift from Rich Text Editor to Wiki Mark up Editor and vice versa

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-32731].
  {panel}

Hi, 
We are running the latest version of Confluence on CentOS 6.5 64bit and we encountered a problem that led us to discover that some of your support documentation is lacking in information or currently inaccurate. 

We had the exact same symptoms as mentioned in this article:
https://confluence.atlassian.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=361725953
"Could not open Space Tools or Manage Space Permissions or Delete Spaces."
So we followed the article and entered the SQL query into the correct database. This returned that there was no such table as 'confluence.bandana' 

Then we followed a commenter's suggestion to clear the plugin cache. We followed this article:
https://confluence.atlassian.com/display/CONFKB/How+to+Clear+Confluence+Plugins+Cache
Just two notes on this:
- The article does not mention to backup directories before nuking.
- The <confluence-home> was actually in /var/applicationdata instead of the assumed /opt/ directory.

I hope this has been of help for your team.

Regards,
Pat
fields.summary: Support Documentation Error
attachment macro
Editor: Make Distraction-free mode the default

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
*NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-32728].
{panel}
As a user, filtering out specific labels from the list of displayed attachments can be useful in situations where:
 # Multiple labels are specified, but files with one specific label should not be present
 # A single label should be excluded from the results while all the rest within the page should be present

 

Hello,
 Is it possible to add a filtering option with label exclusion in the attachment macro?
 In gallery macro we can exclude some tag, it would be perfect to have the same option in attachment.

Regards
fields.summary: Allow for the Attachments Macro to filter out specific labels

fields.description:
When we display a worksheet with more than 100000 rows using the Office Excel macro, it fails with below error:
!img.PNG!

h4.Steps to reproduce:
# Extract the attached Over 100000.7z, to get the  "Over 100000.xls" file.
# Attach the "Over 100000.xls" in a Space.
# Use the office Excel Macro to render the worksheet in the attached file.
# Once you hit the refresh icon next to preview in the Excel Macro you will get below error:
{code}
Error rendering macro 'viewxls' : com.benryan.conversion.ConversionException: com.benryan.conversion.ConversionException: Cannot convert spreadsheet, the number of cells: 1048560 is greater than the maximum allowed cells: 100000
{code}
fields.summary: Office Excel Macro fails to display a worksheet that contains more than 100000 rows.

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-32725].
  {panel}

Hello.

When clicking on a label, the former Confluence version displayed a button to also search for the label in +all+ the spaces.

That is, a button for navigating from this page:

https://confluence.atlassian.com/label/DOC/blogs

To this one:

https://confluence.atlassian.com/label/blogs

However, in the current version of Confluence the *Labelled content* results page does not include this option.



Thanks (:
fields.summary: "View label in all spaces" missing option
"Edit" Button at the Bottom of the Page

fields.description:
When we display a .xlsx excel using the Office Excel macro, if we select a worksheet that contains a graph with multiple variables it fails with below error:
!img.PNG!
h4.Steps to reproduce:
# Attach a xlsx file created in Microsoft Excel in a Space.
# Use the office Excel Macro to render the worksheet in the attached file.
# Once you hit the refresh icon next to preview in the Excel Macro you will get below error:
{code}
Error rendering macro 'viewxls' : com.benryan.conversion.ConversionException: java.lang.Exception: You are calling the wrong method!
{code}

Note: If you open the excel file that was created in Microsoft Excel in Open/Libre Office and save maintaining the xlsx format, the issue will no longer happens.
fields.summary: Office Excel Macro fails to display a worksheet that contains a graph with multiple variables in a Microsoft Excel xlsx file.

fields.description: Confluence 5.4 documentation XML export provided [here|https://confluence.atlassian.com/display/ALLDOC/Confluence+Documentation+Directory] seems to have some missing pages such as 5.4 Release Notes and some sporadic pages e.g. Commenting+on+pages+and+blog+posts
fields.summary: Confluence 5.4 XML Documentation is missing 5.4 Release Notes and some other pages
Attachment macro should not reload the whole page

fields.description:
This is because the doc theme doesn't add ajs-space-key as a meta parameter to the page. This causes the action to actually occur at a global level and not a space level.

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Create a space using the Global Look and Feel
# Go to Space Admin and disable any blueprint
# Change the space to use the Documentation Theme
# Try to re-enable the blueprint
#- Observe that it appears to have worked
# Reload the page
#- Observe that the blueprint is actually still disabled
# Now, try to disable an enabled blueprint
#- Observe that the blueprint has disappeared from the list of space blueprints
#- Go to Global blueprints and observe that the blueprint is now disabled globally.

h3. Workaround
# Set the space theme to Global Look and Feel
# Enable/Disable desired blueprints
# Change the theme back to Documentation Theme
fields.summary: Cannot enable/disable blueprints at space level when using the Documentation theme

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-32717].
  {panel}

There is a request from customer to be able to improve search algorithm so that pages that have been edited recently will get higher weight than those which haven't.

As described on the following document [Ranking of Search Results|https://confluence.atlassian.com/display/CONF51/Ranking+of+Search+Results], there is a weighting of search result based on age. However, it only calculates the age from the creation of the item which means the ranking weights newer item higher but does not take into account the recently edited item.

Please assess the possibility of improving the ranking of search result as per above condition.

Thank you and regards,
Lazuardi
fields.summary: Improve search result scoring to consider weight of recently updated item
Highlight changes on page reload
Function to Rename Space/Space Key when Restoring a Space

fields.description:
1. from safari go to confluence home page, login and make sure the URL is the root home domain, in our case confdev.corp.good.com (not able to access from internet).
2. create a How-To Article, enter the dialog popup and fill up name and click on create.
3. click on cancel without save, or click back on safari
4. the page go back to the home page, the problem is the dialog of "Create a How-To Article" hang on the page, which block home page function. please refer to the attached picture.

the problem maybe caused by for this page confluence server (5.3.1) do not use http header "Cache-Control:no-cache" and safari cached the page with dialog on.
we have another confluence server (5.3) could return this header on the home page, thus not have this problem on safari.
and this do not happen on Chrome.
fields.summary: on confluence home page create a How-To Article, and cancel without save then go back to a erroneous cached page

fields.description:
Steps to reproduce:
 Create a new page "Restricted", with page restrictions
 Create a new page "Child", as a child page of A
 Move "Child" somewhere in the same space, where it is no longer a child of "Restricted".
 Expected behaviour:
 When viewing "Child" there are no longer restrictions on the page.
 Actual behaviour:
 When viewing "Child", there are still restrictions on the page. Opening the dialog shows inherited restrictions still apply.

h4. Workarounds
h5. Option-1 - Flushing the relevant cache
 # Navigate to  !https://confluence.atlassian.com/conf75/files/1004946117/1004946118/1/1590042964839/cog.png|width=16! *{{> General Configuration > Cache Management}}*
 # Clear *{{Inherited Content Permission Sets}}* cache through the UI.
 # Check the behavior.

h5. Option-2 - Re-applying restrictions on the page
Manually remove the restrictions and re-add them to the page.
fields.summary: Inherited page restrictions not updated when page is moved
Dynamic Tasklist

fields.description:
When I click 'show new comment' in EAC, and that comment contains the code macro, the code box is not shown - just a single horizontal line.

Version is 5.5-DEV-4027
fields.summary: Code macro not working in 'show new comment' reload

fields.description:
It has been reported that during automated testing on a clustered instance it is often found that a space will have duplicate watchers. Presumably this is coming from a synchronisation problem between nodes.

However, it is possible this is a bug which already exists on stand-alone (see CONF-7716).
fields.summary: Duplicate watchers for a space can be created in a Confluence cluster

fields.description: We are having an issue on one page where at the end of the page it will not let us format the text. All of the formatting buttons (bold, italicize, bullets, etc) are disabled, and using ctrl + B or any other the other hot keys don't work either. It all works on the rest of the page, just not a few lines of text at the very end. We have had 5 different users try and none have worked. We also tried migrating the page to a different space, and we tried deleting those lines and re-typing them, but we have not been able to get it to work. I can't explain how to replicate the problem because i don't know why it is occuring just on this one page. I have attached a screenshot of what we are seeing. We have been using Confluence for about 3 years, but we recently upgraded from Confluence 3.6 to 5.1.
fields.summary: Formatting options unavailable in one area of editor

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-32707].
  {panel}

There's a blank space where the line should be appearing in JIRA Issues Macro when exporting a page to PDF. This is happening on the top line only. The rest of the lines are displaying properly. 

Looking at the page everything appears to be working properly:

!page.png!

*However*, when we export the page to PDF, it seems that the top line under JIRA's custom fields are not showing up:

!pdf_export.png!

It only seems to appear under JIRA's system fields. This started to happening only a few weeks ago. This can be reproduced by exporting the page to PDF by going through the page itself or by exporting it from the space admin area (Content Tools > Export > PDF > Custom Export > Page).
fields.summary: Line missing from PDF export using JIRA Issues Macro
Ability to expand / collapse the Attachments macro like a page tree
Convenient edit buttom
Cannot link confluence to jira

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-32703].
  {panel}

From the previous Attachment macro (in Confluence 5.0), user can easily access the menu/options on the right side of the attachments:
!https://confluence.atlassian.com/download/attachments/329979993/Attachments_macro.png?version=1&modificationDate=1361222213439&api=v2!

In the latest Confluence version (with the latest Attachment macro), this has changed where the menu/options are located at the bottom of the attachment. If there is a long list of attachment versions, user had to scroll down to the bottom to access the menu/options which would be inconvenient:
!https://confluence.atlassian.com/download/attachments/139378/Attachments_macro052.png?version=2&modificationDate=1391561448538&api=v2!

If not, we should provide options to avoid Confluence displaying all versions of an edited files when it is expanded.
fields.summary: Revert back the layout presentation of the new Attachment Macro
Disabled users In JIRA/LDAP still appear in Confluence in the People directory and can still be mentioned in pages

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-32700].
  {panel}

When using Instructional Text when creating templates in Confluence, you cannot add any formatting.

To reproduce go to:

* Confluence Admin -> Global Templates and Blueprints -> Edit -> Template -> Insert Instructional Text
* Try adding bullets, for example, either by copying a pasting something from the editor and/or trying to use the editor directly
fields.summary: Instructional Text cannot be formatted
History of the Share Button

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-32698].
  {panel}

h3. Summary
The live search macro doesn't return a search result unless the search query is in full word or part of the word is followed by asterisk (i.e. 'tes*') as opposed to the Search function in the top bar. In some cases the live search macro needs five characters before it can dispaly suggested results. 

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Create a new space
# Add Live Search Macro
# Try to search part of a word in Live Search Macro

h3. Expected Results
* The Live Search Macro should return search result even if the search query is not a full word.

h3. Actual Results
* The Live search macro doesn't return a search result unless the search query is in full word.
fields.summary: Live Search Macro doesn't show result unless the search query is in full word

fields.description:
*How to replicate the issue*

# Prepare Confluence release version 5.3.x and 5.4.1
# Prepare a huge wiki mark-up content (more than 100k characters)
# Edit a page and choose "Wiki Markup" macro on both instance
# Paste the prepare wiki markup content to the macro
# Try to insert the wiki markup content
#* Confluence release version 5.3.x will be able to convert it in more than 5 seconds
#* Confluence release version 5.4.1 will fail converting it in less than 5 seconds
fields.summary: Wiki Markup Conversion Process Times out too Fast

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-32692].
  {panel}



There should be a built in configuration setting that allows an Admin to simply disable the "Forgot Password?" functionality without having to add styles and modify templates.

We're currently utilizing the solutions in the workarounds provided below, but we'd like to see this functionality built into Confluence.

Known Workarounds:
https://answers.atlassian.com/questions/102042/remove-forgot-paassword-link-in-confluence

https://confluence.atlassian.com/display/CONF41/Disabling+Password+management+from+User
fields.summary: Add a configuration setting that allows an Admin to disable the "Forgot Password?" functionality.

fields.description:
*How to replicate the issue*

# Open Confluence search page  {code}http://localhost:8090/dosearchsite.action?queryString=<Insert String>{code}
# Change the search string to "edit" and press "enter" 
#* The search page won't reload to provide the new search result
# Change the search string to "quick" and click the "Magnifying Glass" icon
#* The search page still won't reload to provide the new search result

Please note that "Search Bar" in Confluence header still works
fields.summary: Confluence Search Menu does not Work in Clustered Version

fields.description:
Hi,
tell me whether it is possible to set the Confluence user-defined fields, then to work with them as with the data?

For example:
  create a page describing servers: photo <name>, <ip-address> <RAM> etc.

<*> - Additional fields

and on another page display table description page servers

N  Name  Ip-address | RAM
1  name1  ip1  ram1
2  name2  ip2  ram2
....
------------------------------
Total RAM: (ram1 + ram2)
fields.summary: Confluence user-defined fields
Add default editor option to user settings

Also, the indent of the macro doesn't get saved.

fields.description:
h4. Weblinks
* Link to section with formatting error
** https://confluence.atlassian.com/display/Support/Atlassian+Support+Offerings#AtlassianSupportOfferings-FixingBugsandProvidingPatches

h4. Huh?
* The middle part of the Atlassian policy towards patching vs. versioning was (IMSHO) intended to appear as bold text
** *Instead as the trailing '*' was left off or removed the text appears in italics 
* Below is the text copied from the visible page
{quote}
*Critical priority is defined as "production application down or major malfunction causing business revenue loss or high numbers of staff unable to perform their normal functions." This includes security issues.
{quote}
** I believe that the initial '*' was going to convert 'critical priority' to *Critical priority* or make the entire sentence bold

*again, this is a pretty trivial thing, just thought I'd point it out*
fields.summary: Minor (_very_) documentation formatting error in Atlassian policies page
Support for SVG Graphics in Confluence

fields.description:
If a user is watching a JIRA issue, and a restricted comment is made on that issue that the user should not be able to see, the notification still appears in their Confluence notification inbox. When the user navigates to the issue, the correctly are not allowed to see the comment.

This is a significant permissions/security hole in linked JIRA/Confluence environments.
fields.summary: Restricted JIRA comments appear in Confluence notification inbox

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-32679].
  {panel}

Similar to [CONF-26325|https://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONF-26325]

# Login with user that is an administrator of Confluence
# Go to *Confluence Admin > Global Templates and Blueprints*
# Click *Edit* on a Blueprint or Template.
# Click *Preview*
# Preview hangs.

{{sysadmin}} does not have this problem.

Verified on 3 different OD instances.
fields.summary: Unable to Preview Global Blueprints or Templates

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-32678].
  {panel}

Hi,

I have a question. Before my JIRA set on ondemand and now local. How can I configure Google App and JIRA vs Confluence.

With Crowd?

Thanks
fields.summary: Google App vs JIRA vs Confluence

fields.description:
In a corporate setting with users authenticating through an AD it is desirable to have the email attribute kept current by updating it from the AD whenever the user logs in. 

However, there may be cases when this attribute is missing from the user's AD object. In such cases the email address is currently removed from the confluence user object. While the email address is an optional attributes where AD user objects are concerned, it is a required attribute for Confluence users.

Please amend the code or add a switch that will only update the email address of a Confluence user if the contributing source attribute is non-empty.
fields.summary: Make LDAP attribute update non-destructive
Include Space Key in Spaces List Macro
Best practice for PPT use in Confluence pages
Indented <li> elements not formatted in notification emails

fields.description:
*Steps to Reproduce:*
# Attach a file with the title "test test.txt" to a page
# Insert a Livesearch macro, and then search for your attachment
# Click on the attachment in the results dropdown

*Expected Results:*
The browser should open a download popup

*Actual Results:*

The URL is:
{{<baseURL>/download/attachments/1245192/test%2520test.pptx?version=1&modificationDate=1392864162259&api=v2}}

Note: test%2520test.pptx
fields.summary: Spaces in Attachment Filenames are Incorrectly Encoded in the Livesearch Macro
Many OnDemand instances display the WARN: Unable to find configured theme module:

Click "Create Space"
Enter any Space Name
Enter Space Key "~HelloWorld"
Click Create

Create Space dialog gets stuck with a never ending spinner
See attached image

Expected:
Warning Message that ~ is a forbidden character
fields.summary: Putting special Characters in Space Key when creating a Space breaks the Dialog.

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-32668].
  {panel}

Hi Guys,

We love the page history feature in Confluence, however, we'd love it even more if we could have dot versions (or subversions) of documents as when we export them and send externally we have to use the version number and sending a document that has version number 24 or 62 because of minor tweaks doesn't look great?

Any help would be great.

Scroll Versions was noted as a add-on to deliver this functionality, but it doesn't work in OnDemand - can it be added to Confluence OnDemand as an option (paid or unpaid)?
fields.summary: Version control in OnDemand

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-32667].
  {panel}

*Steps to reproduce:*

1) Create a Team Space (Spaces > Create Space > Team Space.
2) Add three members.
3) Save it. You'll see the profile picture of all 3 members in the home page.
4) Then add more members to the Team Space (Space Tools > Permissions > Individual Users). 
5) Give them all the permissions.
6) Go back to the Home Page of the Team Space. 
7) Just the 3 members added on the creation of the space will be there. So basically the Home Page is not updated after adding more members. This give the wrong information for the users, making they think that just 3 people are part of that team.

*Workaround:*

1) Edit the home page of the team space.
2) Add the other users profile manually.
a) Add more columns to the table.
b) Copy the content from one of the other members.
c) Paste and make the necessary changes (profile picture and username below).
fields.summary: Home Page of Team Space not updating members information

fields.description:
In stand-alone Confluence, with an Application Link built to stand-alone JIRA, where the Application URL is different from the Display URL, the link in the Navigation Bar to go to JIRA incorrectly uses the Application URL, rather than the Display URL.

In JIRA, the same link built the same way pointing back to Confluence uses the Display URL - which is the desired behavior.

In our environment, both JIRA and Confluence are behind an SSL terminator - they can talk to each other without SSL, but users cannot reach them on the same ports they use to communicate with each other (both have two entries in servers.xml, and are listening on two ports each). This seems to work great in every respect except for the link on the Navigation Bar from Confluence to JIRA.
fields.summary: Navigation Bar Application Link using wrong URL

fields.description:
The mail archive feature is not working properly for inline images.

Steps to reproduce.

1) Install Confluence 5.4.1 and activate the Mail archive feature
2) Setup an space to receive the email archive
3) Create a new email and attach 2 or more inline images in this email.
4) Send the email to confluence and go to the space mail tab and verify the new email
5) Open the email and you'll see the multiple images as image.png 
6) If you click on any of these image.png, just the first image will be loaded, not the others, although the size of the files are different.
fields.summary: Mail Archive feature retrieve inline images as just one image.png

fields.description:
We have a space that is our knowledgebase and contains close to a thousand pages and attachments. 

We want to move a large portion to other spaces; but, cannot because of other Atlassian bugs that have issues maintaining link references and lose attachments.  So, we're stuck keeping all of this content in this one space until these issues are resolved.  Had we known that Confluence cannot handle large documentation spaces, we would have set it up differently.  But, here we are. 

We use our knowledgebase to generate our customer facing and any other external facing documentation.  But, to export more than one page (e.g. usually is a module that has a couple of parent pages and then all their descendents), we have to use the custom space export.  We also have to use this because it is the only option provided to have footers and headers for all pages. 

Unfortunately, due to volume, that option has become unusable.  It takes approximately 5 minutes to even render a page when selecting the option. Then, when you select Custom Export, it takes another 5 minutes because the solution renders ALL PAGES, ALL Expanded....

We want to be able to get to our hierarchy and then display the children upon request = similar to our sidebar where we retrieve upon request. 

We need a solution to help improve the performance of just trying to create a custom export; and then, address the issues of how long it takes to generate and download. 

Right now, our users are getting very frustrated with the performance. 

We would appreciate advice on how to resolve.
fields.summary: PDF Space Export in large spaces
"info" macro no longer formatted by PDF Stylesheet

fields.description:
As it seems that no one looks at issues for Crowd, and we are mainly affected by this in Confluence, here it goes again:

Our customer faces quite a big (sometimes large) performance problem when synchronizing their Confluence against their Crowd. A full sync (which sometimes happens although incremental sync is enabled) takes 400-600s on an idle, production-like (i.e. powerful) test system, and can take more than an hour in production.
During most of the time, there are no requests to crowd, and only one thread is using a CPU core (100%), there are no I/O waits.
Thread dumps show that the culprit is {{com.atlassian.crowd.directory.DbCachingRemoteChangeOperations.findUserMembershipForGroupChanges}}
This method shows a few weaknesses:
* contains lookups are performed that are O(n)
* ~n lookups are performed, so we have O(n^2)
* the contains lookups are performed against a life view made with Collections2.transform resp. Lists.transform, although the documentation of Collections2.transform states that
{quote}When a live view is not needed, it may be faster to copy the transformed collection and use the copy.{quote}
* the documentation of Lists.transform even states
{code}The function is applied lazily, invoked when needed. This is necessary for the returned list to be a view, but it means that the function will be applied many times for bulk operations like List.contains(java.lang.Object){code}
* which is exactly what is done here
* so we are not only dealing with O(n^2) comparisons, but also with n^2 invocations of toLowerCase, while only n would be needed

See https://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CWD-3799 for a patch.
fields.summary: (Full) Crowd Sync is very slow

fields.description:
Steps to reproduce:

* Create a page in a space
* Attach power point file
* Add power point macro
* Save the page
* Add label on the page

As you can see, the *Add Label* dialog stays behind the power point.
fields.summary: Embedded PowerPoint macro stays in front of label dialog

fields.description:
Not sure if this is something that a real customer will actually do, but it seems like an interesting case.
# Copy the link to a wiki page.
# Edit that wiki page and paste in the link.
# Try to edit the link just pasted, but it cannot be done - after clicking the Edit button, nothing happens.

Please see the screen video: http://screencast.com/t/aVT4i8o4md
fields.summary: Link to current page created by pasting link cannot be edited with property panel

fields.description:
I have a complex page in Confluence with various sections and macros. In one section I have it set as one column. Here's the source on the column with the actual data redacted. {code}

 

/// JavaScript to Invoke JIRA issue collector ]]> {code} The problem is the page include macro. If there's a

tag between it and the next html macro it saves fine. !works.png! If I remove that

tag then it saves fine initially. I then reopen the page and the page include macro is gone. If I save, it saves it with out that macro. !loses data on next save.png!
fields.summary: Page Includes Being Removed on Save
Count report from a confluence page/table

fields.description:
When using Internet Explorer 9, up/down text box arrows display to the right of each entry displaying on a page employing the "Content by Label" macro. 

We think we may have identified the root cause. 

It appears the "LI" element in the CSS for the Content by Label macro is set to "overflow: auto".

When "auto" (overflow) is turned *off*, the text box up/down arrows do not display. This setting is configured in the file "content_by_label_resources.css".
fields.summary: The "Content by Label" macro presents up/down text box arrows next to each list entry in IE9

fields.description: The Report a bug link results in an 404
fields.summary: Report a bug link broken

fields.description:
- Create a group in Confluence Admin
- Click "Add Members"
- insert username or search for user
- Click add

=> Nothing happens, user is not added to the group
fields.summary: Cannot add user to Confluence group

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-32650].
  {panel}

I, and most of my team hit this pretty much every week.

To reproduce:
1. Start typing {include ... and bring up the dialog box.
2. Paste a URL from a page you have open in another tab such as http://confluence.blah.blah/display/RSYS/DevOps+Weekly+Reports+-+2014-02-14
3. include-page is stupid - it doesn't recognize that this an addressable page.
4. Painstakingly remove the http://... prefix, change all "+" to " " until the link is acceptable to confluence.

Expected:
1. Confluence can work ot what to do with an absolute URL
2. (nice to have but not required) a much better page selection widget with
 a. selection of last N pages you've visited (like jira does)
 b. autocompletion with incremental suggestion list narrowing
fields.summary: Include-Page macro is stupid

fields.description:

Next move the page to another space.
Now you have the same task in your inbox two times.

fields.description:
When you edit a page that you have draft changes for, and click resume editing, it removes the page id from the url for some reason.  This happens in both quick edit and full edit.

I've only tested on Chrome 31.
fields.summary: Resume editing link deletes page id
Suggest labels in Content Report Table macro
Suggest labels in Content by Label macro

fields.description:
A third party scan found that createrssfeed action is vulnerable to [content spoofing|https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Content_Spoofing], in specific text injection. In this case the content spoofing may be used to perform a phishing attack on users. 

How to reproduce:
1. go to https://$confluence/$contextPath/wiki/spaces/createrssfeed.action?types=blogpost&spaces=ds&sort=modified&title=Please%20login%20at%20https://attacker.com&maxResults=15&publicFeed=false&os_authType=basic&rssType=atom
2. observe that the title parameter is found in the response.

Note: different browsers render the rss feed xml differently and while chrome just shows the raw xml, Internet Explorer and firefox both render the xml returned as a 'semi-html page'.
fields.summary: Content Spoofing in the createrssfeed action

fields.description:
If I search for Pete, confluence search returns the user Pete and content where the word "Pete" exists.  However if I @mention "@Pete Smith" (who's username happens to be "psmith") I don't get that content back.  The only way to get that content returned via search seems to be searching for "psmith".

This appears to be a bug as Conflunence should be able to return al content with the word Pete, the @mention of Pete, and anything else that matches Pete in the same results.

Let me know if you need clarification on the description of this issue with search and @mentions.
fields.summary: search for user's name does not return content where user is (at) @mentioned

fields.description:
I insert a list of JIRA issues with the Inser function in Confluence.
I use JQL like "project in (ERR) AND fixVersion = "5.1.6" ORDER BY key ASC"
If I click on "show all" in JIRA I see a defective JQL like "project%20in%20(ERR)%20AND%20fixVersion%20=%20%225.1.6%22%20ORDER%20BY%20key%20ASC"
fields.summary: "Show all" at Insert JIRA-Issue, makes defective JQL in JIRA

fields.description:

# Create a page in Confluence 5.4.2

¹¹¹¹¹

³³³³³
¼¼¼¼¼

œœœœ
©©©©©©
# Add the TOC macro into the page

The math symbol are not displayed as it supposed to be
!mathsymbol.PNG|thumbnail!
fields.summary: Mathematical symbol are not displaying properly in Table of content

fields.description:
Copy&pasteing images from Confluence to Word does not work properly.

*To Reproduce*
 1) Confluence: Right click an image from a Confluence content page (view mode) and click "copy image"
 2) Word: ctrl-V
 (across different Confluence, Word and Windows versions)

Something is beeing inserted into the Word doducment. Though the image is not beeing displayed - just like a placeholder for the image.

*There is a workarround in Word* (though it's quite time-consuming...)
 * Start>Insert>Insert Content>device-independet bitmap
 * this will insert the image correctly

 

*Workaround in MS Word 2016 on Windows*
 * Right click anywhere on MS Word
 * Under _Paste Options_ select _Paste Picture_

_!wordPaste.png|thumbnail!_

The same can also be done by accessing the _Paste_ options on the _Home_ menu.
fields.summary: Copy&paste Image from Confluence to Word
Send a welcome Message to newly registered user
Content Report Table Macro should support the AND operator

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-32634].
  {panel}

1. Open the create dialog
2. choose anything except 'blank page'
3. every one of these actions attempts to use 'setItem()', and put something in local storage.
4. If the local storage quote is exceeded, a JS error occurs, and the dialog just sits there, spinning. The user can now no longer create anything except blank pages.

We should handle this error properly, rather than make confluence unusable.
fields.summary: Create Dialog becomes unusable when chrome local storage quota is exceeded

fields.description:
Editing a link shows the full breadcrumb path even for very long breadcrumbs, instead of putting an ellipsis between the first and last breadcrumb elements.

http://cl.ly/image/2V2S1q262z2z
fields.summary: Editing a link in link dialog shows all the breadcrumbs text and it spans multiple lines

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-32625].
  {panel}

Suggested improvement: 
* requester needs to fill in mandatory "justification" field before he/she is allowed to submit the access request
* email notification sent to the person supposed to grant access to target page contains the justification text and requester's email address or any other kind of info which can be easily used to uniquely identify and contact the requester.

The complaint from user is as follows:
At some point I started to receive emails from "<Firstname Lastname> (Confluence)" <confluence.mail@####.###> with subject "\[Confluence\] <Firstname Lastname> requested access to <some page>".
Although this approach may seem pretty elegant to the requestor, but I as the request receiver feel very uncomfortable about that, as the request contains no justification/explanation so the next thing I'd need to do is to contact the requestor, but my reply will go eventually to confluence.mail@####.###. It means I need then start identifying the correct email address of the requestor.
fields.summary: Optional "reason" field for users to fill when requesting access to a page

fields.description:
On a completely fresh install of confluence, connected to jira and running behind apache with mod_proxy (both jira and confluence are running in their own individual container with two virtual hosts configured in apache).

All I did on both systems was disable gzip compression. 

In confluence I went to users/viewmysettings.action to change the language back to English (UK) because it was automatically set to german (because I live in Vienna, Austria). 

Everything is correctly displayed in english, except for one menu item (see screenshot!). 

If it would help I can provide access to my system, just let me know (but do keep in mind the timezone difference!)
fields.summary: Menu Item not respecting language setting, falls back on automatic detection?

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-32623].
  {panel}

It will be nice if we can export the comparison page of history page so that we send to the customer what has been changed/improved.

All of the highlight and key shall be included in the pdf.
!pagecomparison.PNG|thumbnail!

But for current's export pdf function, we only manage to get the current version of the page exported.

Kindly refer to the attachment below _TEST-Timeframe-140214-1700-7.pdf_

Current work around

Print page by using pdf printer

Kindly refer to the attachment below _compared.pdf_
fields.summary: Export Comparison page to PDF

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-32621].
  {panel}

I am creating a connect add-on that is similar to Confluence Questions.  I would like to have the WebItem link appear to the left of the create button so it can look like a top level add-on (like Confluence Questions or Confluence People).

https://www.evernote.com/shard/s2/sh/f7e352c5-4342-47d6-a5be-621487c60213/b3dfb05f00c57039929692fc3e9ef73c

https://www.evernote.com/shard/s2/sh/360b9676-f9b3-4861-ac09-11f5986f9730/fbef3e209e2348f9f0bf4baff7cd4efd

Currently the only location I can find is:

            "location": "system.header/left",
fields.summary: Currently a connect add on web item cannot be located next to other links.

fields.description:
If you change the cell format under Office of an Excel file to french formatting for the time (e.g. 0 h 30), the the time values will be altered inside the Viewfile macro. 

By changing the cell format to English (00:30) the values will properly work.

Attached is a screenshot of the Excel file opened in an Microsoft Office and then, after attached in [Office Excel macro|https://confluence.atlassian.com/display/DOC/Office+Excel+Macro] (viewfile). Also, the same file is attached to be tested.
fields.summary: Altered Time Values in Office Excel/Viewfile Macro if French Formatting is Used
